Smart Toothbrush App: Develop an app that connects to an electric toothbrush and tracks brushing habits, provides personalized coaching, and gamifies the brushing experience. Users can earn points, badges, and rewards for brushing consistently and properly.

Toothbrush with UV Sensors: Create an electric toothbrush with built-in UV sensors that can detect plaque and stains in hard-to-reach areas. The toothbrush would emit a light that highlights the areas where more attention is needed.

Electric Toothbrush with Biometric Sensors: Develop an electric toothbrush that uses biometric sensors to monitor the pressure and speed of brushing. The toothbrush would provide feedback to the user to ensure they are brushing correctly and avoid damaging their teeth.

Electric Toothbrush with Air Pressure: Create an electric toothbrush that uses air pressure to clean teeth and remove plaque. The toothbrush would emit a stream of air that would remove debris from teeth and gums.

Electric Toothbrush with Augmented Reality: Develop an electric toothbrush that uses augmented reality to provide a virtual brushing experience. Users would see a 3D model of their teeth and gums, and the toothbrush would guide them through the brushing process, highlighting areas that need attention.
